Sites using Jekyll

It’s interesting to see what designs and features others have come up with. Below are some Jekyll-powered blogs which were hand-picked for learning purposes.

  • Tom Preston-Werner (source)
  • Nick Quaranto (source)
  • Roger Chapman (source)
  • GitHub Official Teaching Materials (source)
  • Rasmus Andersson (source)
  • Scott Chacon (source)

If you would like to explore more examples, you can find a list of sites and their sources on the “Sites” page in the Jekyll wiki.
